Articles.Content:
I recently have started to get involved in the 'International construction ISS in Kerbal orbit' collaboration project by BobCat and I decided that us as a community could make something similar but, with our own (non-ISS) module designs.

If You Make A Module:

- Make it at a good quality.

- Make it original.

- Send them to me with a picture of where they should go on the station.

- Make them realistic.

- Have fun doing it.

I will start this properly when I know that people want to do this. If you do want to do this, put this as a reply to the thread:

Name: ... (Not Your Real Name)

Module Name: ...

Flag: ...

Download: ... (Remember to add the picture so I know where to put it)

Station Map: (Coming Soon)

Mods:

- http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59207 (All Of These)

-KAS

- SCANsat

- Visual Enhancements (High/Low Res)

- HullCam VDS

- Kerbal Alarm Clock

- Toolbar

- ProbeControlRoom

- RasterPropMonitor

- AIES Antennas for RemoteTech2

- MechJeb

- TreeLoader

- Ship Manifest

- Infernal Robotics

- Suggest Any Other Mods You Want To Include.

Members:

Name: ImmerHerstellungWeltall

Module Name: Verbunden

Flag: (Not Yet Done).

Name: WJDubs

Module Name: Deep Space Imager with Exposed Research Pallet

Flag:

Edited April 5, 2014 by ImmerHerstellungWeltall

I would like to do this. I'll edit this post later with a download, and pictures, but for now, here is my app:

Name: WJDubs

Module Name: Deep Space Imager with Exposed Research Pallet (I'll come up with a better name later)

Flag:

Download and Pics: Coming Soon!

What mods are we using, also? My idea for this uses KAS and crew manifest, but that will just be for transferring crew into the station.
I would like to join this project, please send me a list with the mods you use, i will send pictures from my module later
